title: Restoring force - force change as spring lengthens

content.prompt: A block attached to a spring oscillates in simple harmonic motion, with the spring providing the only force on the block. How does the magnitude of the force exerted by the spring on the block change as the spring length increases from its minimum to its maximum value?

choices.label: It decreases at first and then increases.
It increases at first and then decreases.

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
